about.introText:
... passionate about web development, combining logic and creativity to build user-focused solutions.

I enjoy learning new technologies like Angular and responsive design to continuously grow.

I tackle challenges analytically and thrive in agile, collaborative teams.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Got a problem to solve?
contact.text1: I’m a frontend developer passionate about clean code, accessibility, and user-centered design. Let’s build something valuable together!
contact.text2: Need a frontend developer? Contact me!
contact.checkbox: I agree to the processing of my data as stated in the
contact.success: Looking forward to talking to you

work.title: My Work
work.description: Explore a selection of my work here – Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

join.title: Join
join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

pokedex.title: Pokédex
pokedex.description: Based on the PokéAPI, a simple library that provides and catalogues Pokémon information.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: A personal portfolio website built with Angular, showcasing my projects, skills, and experience as a web developer. Designed with a responsive layout and modern UI.

sharky.title: Sharky
sharky.description: "Jump, run, and throw" game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Sharky collect coins and potions to fight against the dangerous Orca.

testimonials.name: Max Name
testimonials.quote: Another example of a brief and positive testimonial.

testimonials.name: Simon Heistermann
testimonials.quote: Jana works in a structured, reliable, and thoughtful manner. Her calm and clear communication, combined with strong organizational skills, contributed significantly to the progress of our project. Working with her was always pleasant, effective, and above all, successful. I can wholeheartedly recommend Jana!
